%%sql

-- Build SourceSystem_Fact table
-- INSERT OVERWRITE achieves the same as a TRUNCATE TABLE and INSERT INTO but in one statement

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact (
    SourceSystemID,
    Description,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID
)

SELECT
    NULL AS SourceSystemID,
    "SAP HR" AS Description,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate, 
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5("SAP HR") as RowID
;

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact (
    SourceSystemID,
    Description,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID
)

SELECT
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Description NULLS LAST) AS SourceSystemID,
    Description,
    StartDate, 
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID
FROM odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact

%%sql
-- Build diversity_dim table


-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW diversity_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Ethnic_Origin IS NULL
        THEN first(T3.DiversityID)
        ELSE NULL
    END as DiversityID, -- surrogate key
    Ethnic_Origin AS Description,
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID, -- NOT CORRECT
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(Ethnic_Origin) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Ethnic_Origin = first(T3.Description) AND md5(concat(T1.Ethnic_Origin)) <> first(T3.RowID)     
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN first(T3.Description) IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Ethnic_Origin IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData

FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.diversity_dim T3 ON T1.Ethnic_Origin = T3.Description
WHERE  (T3.IsActive = 'Y' or T3.IsActive IS NULL)
    
        AND (
        
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.Ethnic_Origin = T3.Description AND md5(concat(T1.Ethnic_Origin)) <> T3.RowID
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.Description IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' ) OR
        
        -- flags deleted data
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.Ethnic_Origin IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END = 'Y' )
    )

    AND

        T1.Ethnic_Origin IS NOT NULL

GROUP BY T1.Ethnic_Origin

;

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW diversity_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 

    DiversityID,
    Description, 
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From diversity_dim_new

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    DiversityID,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.diversity_dim
WHERE Description IN (SELECT Description FROM diversity_dim_new); -- gets original versions of updated rows

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.diversity_dim AS Target
USING diversity_dim_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.DiversityID = Target.DiversityID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.EndDate = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;   

-- Insert new DiversityID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.diversity_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DiversityID NULLS LAST) AS DiversityID, 
    Description, 
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.diversity_dim;

Select * FROM odw_harmonised_db.diversity_dim;

%%sql
-- Build disability_dim table
-- INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.disability_dim (
--     DisabilityID,
--     DisabilityCode,
--     Description,
--     SourceSystemID,
--     StartDate,
--     EndDate,
--     IngestionDate,
--     ValidTo
-- )

-- SELECT
--     uuid() AS DisabilityID,
--     Disability_Text AS DisabilityCode,
--     Disability_Code_Description AS Description, 
--     first(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID, 
--     CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
--     '9999-12-31' AS EndDate,
--     CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
--     NULL AS ValidTo
-- FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
-- LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
-- GROUP BY Disability_Text, Disability_Code_Description;

-- NEW
-- Build disability_dim table

-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW disability_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Disability_Text IS NULL
        THEN first(T3.DisabilityID)
        ELSE NULL
    END as DisabilityID, -- surrogate key
    Disability_Text AS DisabilityCode,
    first(T1.Disability_Code_Description) AS Description,
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID, -- NOT CORRECT
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(Disability_Text) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Disability_Text = first(T3.DisabilityCode) AND md5(concat(T1.Disability_Text)) <> first(T3.RowID)     
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN first(T3.DisabilityCode) IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Disability_Text IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData

FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.disability_dim T3 ON T1.Disability_Text = T3.DisabilityCode
WHERE  (T3.IsActive = 'Y' or T3.IsActive IS NULL)
    
        AND (
        
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.Disability_Text = T3.DisabilityCode AND md5(concat(T1.Disability_Text)) <> T3.RowID
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.DisabilityCode IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' ) OR
        
        -- flags deleted data
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.Disability_Text IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END = 'Y' )
    )

    AND
        T1.Disability_Text IS NOT NULL

GROUP BY T1.Disability_Text

;

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW disability_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    DisabilityID,
    DisabilityCode,
    Description, 
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From disability_dim_new

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    DisabilityID,
    DisabilityCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.disability_dim
WHERE DisabilityCode IN (SELECT DisabilityCode FROM disability_dim_new); -- gets original versions of updated rows

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.disability_dim AS Target
USING disability_dim_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.DisabilityID = Target.DisabilityID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.EndDate = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;   

-- Insert new DisabilityID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.disability_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DisabilityID NULLS LAST) AS DisabilityID, 
    DisabilityCode,
    Description, 
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.disability_dim;

Select * FROM odw_harmonised_db.disability_dim;

%%sql

-- Build religion_dim table
-- INSERT OVERWRITE achieves the same as a TRUNCATE TABLE and INSERT INTO but in one statement

-- INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.religion_dim (
--     ReligionID,
--     ReligionCode,
--     Description,
--     SourceSystemID,
--     StartDate,
--     EndDate,
--     IngestionDate,
--     ValidTo
-- )

-- SELECT
--     uuid() AS ReligionID,
--     Religion AS ReligionCode,
--     Religious_Denomination_Key AS Description, 
--     first(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
--     CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
--     '9999-12-31' AS EndDate,
--     CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
--     NULL AS ValidTo
-- FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
-- LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
-- GROUP BY Religion, Religious_Denomination_Key;

-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW religion_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Religion IS NULL
        THEN first(T3.SXOID)
        ELSE NULL
    END as ReligionID, -- surrogate key
    Religion AS ReligionCode,
    first(T1.Religious_Denomination) AS Description,
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID, -- NOT CORRECT
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(Religion) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Religion = first(T3.ReligionCode) AND md5(concat(T1.Religion)) <> first(T3.RowID)     
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN first(T3.ReligionCode) IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Religion IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData

FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.religion_dim T3 ON T1.Religion = T3.ReligionCode
WHERE  (T3.IsActive = 'Y' or T3.IsActive IS NULL)
    
        AND (
        
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.Religion = T3.ReligionCode AND md5(concat(T1.Religion)) <> T3.RowID
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.ReligionCode IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' ) OR
        
        -- flags deleted data
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.Religion IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END = 'Y' )
    )

    AND
        T1.Religion IS NOT NULL

GROUP BY T1.Religion

;

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW religion_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    ReligionID,
    ReligionCode,
    Description, 
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From religion_dim_new

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    ReligionID,
    ReligionCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.religion_dim
WHERE ReligionCode IN (SELECT ReligionCode FROM religion_dim_new); -- gets original versions of updated rows

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.religion_dim AS Target
USING religion_dim_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.ReligionID = Target.ReligionID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.EndDate = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;   

-- Insert new ReligionID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.religion_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ReligionID NULLS LAST) AS ReligionID, 
    ReligionCode,
    Description, 
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.religion_dim;

Select * FROM odw_harmonised_db.religion_dim;

%%sql

-- Build sxo_dim table
-- INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.sxo_dim (
--     SXOID,
--     Description,
--     SourceSystemID,
--     StartDate,
--     EndDate,
--     IngestionDate,
--     ValidTo
-- )

-- SELECT
--     uuid() AS SXOID,
--     SxO AS Description, 
--     first(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID, 
--     CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
--     '9999-12-31' AS EndDate,
--     CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
--     NULL AS ValidTo
-- FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
-- LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
-- GROUP BY SxO;

-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW sxo_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.SxO IS NULL
        THEN first(T3.SXOID)
        ELSE NULL
    END as SXOID, -- surrogate key
    SxO AS Description,
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID, -- NOT CORRECT
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(SxO) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.SxO = first(T3.Description) AND md5(concat(T1.SxO)) <> first(T3.RowID)     
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN first(T3.Description) IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.SxO IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData

FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sxo_dim T3 ON T1.SxO = T3.Description
WHERE  (T3.IsActive = 'Y' or T3.IsActive IS NULL)
    
        AND (
        
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.SxO = T3.Description AND md5(concat(T1.SxO)) <> T3.RowID
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.Description IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' ) OR
        
        -- flags deleted data
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.SxO IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END = 'Y' )
    )

    AND

        T1.SxO IS NOT NULL

GROUP BY T1.SxO

;

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW sxo_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    SXOID,
    Description, 
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From sxo_dim_new

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    SXOID,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.sxo_dim
WHERE Description IN (SELECT Description FROM sxo_dim_new); -- gets original versions of updated rows

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.sxo_dim AS Target
USING sxo_dim_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.SXOID = Target.SXOID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.EndDate = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;   

-- Insert new SXOID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.sxo_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SXOID NULLS LAST) AS SXOID, 
    Description, 
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.sxo_dim;

Select * FROM odw_harmonised_db.sxo_dim;

%%sql
-- Build and merge secureinfo_fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.secureinfo_fact AS Target
USING ( SELECT
            uuid() AS SecureInfoID, -- surrogate key
            T1.Ref_No AS SourceID, -- source system id
            T3.DisabilityID,
            T4.DiversityID,
            T5.ReligionID,
            T6.SXOID, 
            T2.SourceSystemID,
            CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
            '9999-12-31' AS EndDate,
            CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
            NULL AS ValidTo,
            md5(concat(Ref_No,DisabilityID,DiversityID,ReligionID,SXOID)) as RowID,
            'Y' as IsActive

        FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
        LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
        LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.disability_dim T3 ON (T1.Disability_Text = T3.DisabilityCode  AND T1.Disability_Code_Description = T3.Description)
        LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.diversity_dim T4 ON T1.Ethnic_Origin = T4.Description
        LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.religion_dim T5 ON (T1.Religion = T5.ReligionCode  AND T1.Religious_Denomination_Key = T5.Description)
        LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sxo_dim T6 ON T1.SxO = T6.Description
    ) AS Source

ON Source.SourceID = Target.SourceID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED AND Target.RowID <> Source.RowID
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.EndDate = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;    

-- Insert changed data as new row

INSERT INTO odw_harmonised_db.secureinfo_fact (
    SecureInfoID,
    SourceID,
    DisabilityID,
    DiversityID,
    ReligionID,
    SXOID,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS SecureInfoID, -- surrogate key
    T1.Ref_No AS SourceID, -- source system id
    T3.DisabilityID,
    T4.DiversityID,
    T5.ReligionID,
    T6.SXOID, 
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    'null' AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(T1.Ref_No, T3.DisabilityID, T4.DiversityID, T5.ReligionID, T6.SXOID)) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive
FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.disability_dim T3 ON (T1.Disability_Text = T3.DisabilityCode  AND T1.Disability_Code_Description = T3.Description)
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.diversity_dim T4 ON T1.Ethnic_Origin = T4.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.religion_dim T5 ON (T1.Religion = T5.ReligionCode  AND T1.Religious_Denomination_Key = T5.Description)
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sxo_dim T6 ON T1.SxO = T6.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.secureinfo_fact T7 ON T1.Ref_No = T7.SourceID
WHERE T1.Ref_No = T7.SourceID AND md5(concat(T1.Ref_No, T3.DisabilityID, T4.DiversityID, T5.ReligionID, T6.SXOID)) <> T7.RowID;

-- Deactivate old rows

UPDATE odw_harmonised_db.secureinfo_fact
    SET T1.IsActive = 'N',
        T1.EndDate = date_sub(current_timestamp,1)
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.secureinfo_fact T1
        LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T2 ON T1.SourceID = T2.Ref_No
        WHERE T2.Ref_No IS NULL 
    
    -- Where SourceID IN 
    -- (
    --     SELECT SourceID
    --     FROM odw_harmonised_db.secureinfo_fact T1
    --     LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T2 ON T1.SourceID = T2.Ref_No
    --     WHERE T2.Ref_No IS NULL
    -- )

%%sql  

-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW secureinfo_fact_new 

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Ref_No IS NULL
        THEN T7.SecureInfoID
        ELSE NULL
    END as SecureInfoID, -- surrogate key
    T1.Ref_No AS SourceID, -- source system id
    T3.DisabilityID,
    T4.DiversityID,
    T5.ReligionID,
    T6.SXOID, 
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    'null' AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(T1.Ref_No, T3.DisabilityID, T4.DiversityID, T5.ReligionID, T6.SXOID)) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Ref_No = T7.SourceID AND md5(concat(T1.Ref_No, T3.DisabilityID, T4.DiversityID, T5.ReligionID, T6.SXOID)) <> T7.RowID    -- same employee, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T7.SourceID IS NULL -- new employee
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Ref_No IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData

FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.disability_dim T3 ON (T1.Disability_Text = T3.DisabilityCode  AND T1.Disability_Code_Description = T3.Description)
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.diversity_dim T4 ON T1.Ethnic_Origin = T4.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.religion_dim T5 ON (T1.Religion = T5.ReligionCode  AND T1.Religious_Denomination_Key = T5.Description)
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sxo_dim T6 ON T1.SxO = T6.Description
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.secureinfo_fact T7 ON T1.Ref_No = T7.SourceID
WHERE  (T7.IsActive = 'Y' or T7.IsActive IS NULL)
    
        AND (
        
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.Ref_No = T7.SourceID AND md5(concat(T1.Ref_No, T3.DisabilityID, T4.DiversityID, T5.ReligionID, T6.SXOID)) <> T7.RowID     
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T7.SourceID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' ) OR
        
        -- flags deleted data
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.Ref_No IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END = 'Y' )
)
;

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW secureinfo_fact_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 

    SecureInfoID, -- surrogate key
    SourceID, -- source system id
    DisabilityID,
    DiversityID,
    ReligionID,
    SXOID, 
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From secureinfo_fact_new

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    SecureInfoID, -- surrogate key
    SourceID, -- source system id
    DisabilityID,
    DiversityID,
    ReligionID,
    SXOID, 
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.secureinfo_fact
WHERE SourceID IN (SELECT SourceID FROM secureinfo_fact_new); -- gets original versions of updated rows

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.secureinfo_fact AS Target
USING secureinfo_fact_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.SecureInfoID = Target.SecureInfoID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.EndDate = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;   

-- Insert new SecureInfoID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.secureinfo_fact 

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SecureInfoID NULLS LAST) AS SecureInfoID, 
    SourceID, 
    DisabilityID,
    DiversityID,
    ReligionID,
    SXOID, 
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.secureinfo_fact;

SELECT * from odw_harmonised_db.secureinfo_fact where sourceID = '2210-1102';

%%sql

SELECT * from odw_harmonised_db.secureinfo_fact where sourceID = '2210-1102'

%%sql
-- amendments to personal_characteristics

--DELETE FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics  where Ref_no = '2210-1103'

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Ref_No IS NULL
        THEN T7.SecureInfoID
        ELSE NULL
    END as SecureInfoID, -- surrogate key
    T1.Ref_No AS SourceID, -- source system id
    T3.DisabilityID,
    T4.DiversityID,
    T5.ReligionID,
    T6.SXOID, 
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    'null' AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(T1.Ref_No, T3.DisabilityID, T4.DiversityID, T5.ReligionID, T6.SXOID)) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Ref_No = T7.SourceID AND md5(concat(T1.Ref_No, T3.DisabilityID, T4.DiversityID, T5.ReligionID, T6.SXOID)) <> T7.RowID     
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T7.SourceID IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Ref_No IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData,
    T7.IsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.personal_characteristics T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.disability_dim T3 ON (T1.Disability_Text = T3.DisabilityCode  AND T1.Disability_Code_Description = T3.Description)
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.diversity_dim T4 ON T1.Ethnic_Origin = T4.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.religion_dim T5 ON (T1.Religion = T5.ReligionCode  AND T1.Religious_Denomination_Key = T5.Description)
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sxo_dim T6 ON T1.SxO = T6.Description
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.secureinfo_fact T7 ON T1.Ref_No = T7.SourceID

%%sql
-- Build Employee_Dim table 

-- Notes - Addresses are only supplied for Inspectors - need to check inspector count against addresses data

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim (
    EmployeeID,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    DOB,
    NINumber,
    Gender,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressLine3,
    City,
    County,
    PostCode,
    EmailAddress,
    TelephoneNumberPersonal,
    TelephoneNumberWork,
    PersNumber,
    EmployeeNumber,
    FTE,
    WorkHours,
    PartTimeEmployee,
    EmploymentStatus,
    CivilServiceStart,
    DateToCurrentJob,
    SeniorityDate,
    OrgStartDate,
    FixTermEndDate,
    LoanStartDate,
    LoanEndDate,
    PayrollArea,
    AssignmentNumber,
    EmployeeGroup,
    AnnualSalary,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT 
    uuid(), --EmployeeID
    T1.First_name as FirstName,
    T1.Last_name as LastName,
    T1.Birth_date as DOB,
    T1.NI_number as NINumber,
    T1.Gender_Key as Gender,
    T2.Street_and_House_Number as AddressLine1,
    T2.`2nd_Address_Line` as AddressLine2,
    T2.District as AddressLine3,
    T2.City as City,
    T2.Region_State_Province_Count as County,
    T2.Postal_Code as PostCode,
    T3.Email_Address as EmailAddress,
    T2.Personal_Mobile as TelephoneNumberPersonal,
    T2.Work_Mobile as TelephoneNumberWork,
    T2.Staff_Number as PersNumber,
    T1.Pers_No as EmployeeNumber,
    T1.FTE,
    T1.Wk_hrs as WorkHours,
    T1.`Indicator_Part-Time_Employee` as PartTimeEmployee,
    T1.Employment_Status as EmploymentStatus,
    T1.Civil_Service_Start as CivilServiceStart,
    T1.Date_to_Current_Job as DateToCurrentJob,
    T1.Seniority_Date as SeniorityDate,
    T1.Org_Start_Date as OrgStartDate,
    T1.Fix_Term_End_Date as FixTermEndDate,
    T1.Loan_Start_Date as LoanStartDate,
    T1.Loan_End_Date as LoadEndDate,
    T1.Payroll_Area as PayrollArea,
    T1.Assignment_Number as AssignmentNumber,
    T1.Employee_Group as EmployeeGroup,
    T1.Annual_salary as AnnualSalary,
    T4.SourceSystemID,
    current_timestamp as StartDate,
    '9999-12-31' as EndDate,
    current_timestamp as IngestDate,
    null as ValidTo

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr T1
LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.vw_addresses T2 ON T1.Pers_No = T2.Staff_Number
LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.vw_email T3 ON T2.Staff_Number = T3.Staff_Number
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T4 ON "SAP HR" = T4.Description

-- select T1.*
-- from odw_standardised_db.vw_addresses t1
-- LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr t2 on t1.Staff_Number = t2.Pers_No
-- where t2.pers_no is null

GROUP BY T1.PA

%%sql
-- Build WorkSchedule_dim table - MISSING CREATING THE TABLE WITH THE py_create_tables_new (Currently not working)

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.WorkSchedule_dim (
    WorkScheduleID,
    WorkScheduleRule,
    WorkWeekDays,
    WorkWeekHours,
    WorkDayHours,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,

)


SELECT

    Work_Schedule_Rule AS WorkScheduleRule,

    Wk_hrs AS WorkWeekHours,
    Hrs_Day AS WorkDayHours,
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) AS SourceSystemID,

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.Specialism_dim (
    SpecialismID,
    EmployeeID,
    Qualification,
    Proficiency,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,

    Proficien AS Proficiency,
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) AS SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    '9999-12-31' AS EndDate,

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_specialisms T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.LeaveEntitlement_dim (

    LeaveYearStart,

%%sql
-- Build absence_dim table 

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.Absence_dim (
    AbsenceID,
    EmployeeID,
    StaffNumber,
    Type,
    SicknessGroup,
    AbsenceStartDate,
    AbsenceEndDate,
    Days,
    CalendarDays,
    WorkScheduleID,
    AnnualLeaveStart,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)


SELECT
    uuid() AS AbsenceID,
    T4.EmployeeID,
    T1.Staff_Number as StaffNumber,
    T1.Attendance_or_Absence_Type as Type,
    T1.Sickness_Group as SicknessGroup,
    T1.Start_Date as AbsenceStartDate,
    T1.End_Date as AbsenceEndDate,
    T1.Days,
    T1.Cal_Days as CalendarDays,
    T3.WorkScheduleID,
    T1.Annual_Leave_Start AS AnnualLeaveStart,
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_absences T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.workschedule_dim T3 ON  T1.Work_Schedule_Rule = T3.WorkScheduleRule AND  
                                                    T1.Wk_hrs = T3.WorkWeekHours AND
                                                    T1.Hrs_Day = T3.WorkDayHours AND
                                                    T1.WkDys = T3.WorkWeekDays
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T4 ON T1.Staff_Number = T4.PersNumber

%%sql
-- Build contract_dim table

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.contract_dim (
    ContractID,
    ContractCode,
    Description,
    ContractTypeCode,
    ContractType,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS ContractID,
    T1.WorkC as ContractCode, 
    First(T1.Work_Contract) as Description,
    T1.CT as ContractTypeCode,
    First(T1.Contract_Type) as ContractType,
    First(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    '9999-12-31' AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr T1 -- CHECK
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY T1.WorkC, T1.Work_Contract, T1.CT, T1.Contract_Type

GROUP BY T1.PS_Group

-- Build OrganisationUnit_dim table

    OrganisationUnitID,
    OrganisationUnit,
    Description,

)

SELECT

    T1.Organizational_Key12 AS OrganisationUnitKey,
    First(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,

    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY T1.Org_unit, T1.Organizational_Unit, T1.Organizational_Key12

    CostCenterID,
    CostCenterCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS CostCenterID,
    T1.Cost_Ctr AS CostCenterCode,
    First(T1.Cost_Centre) AS Description,
    First(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,

LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description

%%sql
-- Build Employee_HR_Hierarchy_Dim table  

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.Employee_HR_Hierarchy_Dim (
    EmployeeHRHierarchyID,
    EmployeeID,
    ManagerEmployeeID,
    CounterSignManagerID, -- join back on first name and last name
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo
)

SELECT
    uuid() AS EmployeeHRHierarchyID,
    T3.EmployeeID AS EmployeeID,
    T4.EmployeeID as ManagerEmployeeID,
    T5.EmployeeID AS CounterSignManagerID,
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    '9999-12-31' AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T3 ON T1.Pers_No = T3.PersNumber
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T4 ON T1.Pers_No_2 = T4.PersNumber
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T5 ON T1.Counter_Sign_Manager = CONCAT(T5.FirstName,' ', T5.LastName)

%%sql

-- Build FACT - HR_Record_Fact

Select
    -- uuid() as HRRecordID,
    -- T2.EmployeeID,
    -- T1.CoCd as CoCd, -- do we need this, always the same
    -- T1.Company_Code as CompanyCode, -- do we need this, always the same
    -- T3.PersonnelAreaID,
    -- T4.PersonnelSubAreaID,
    -- T5.OrganisationUnitID,
    -- T6.ContractID,
    -- T7.PayBandID,
    -- T8.CostCenterID,
    -- T9.PositionID,
    -- T10.ManagersEmployeeID,
    -- null as ManagerPositionID,
    -- T10.CounterSignManagerID,
    -- T11.LocationID,
    -- T13.WorkScheduleID,
    -- T14.SpecialismID
        
    count(*)

From odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr T1 -- 997
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T2                 ON T1.Pers_No = T2.PersNumber -- 997
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.personnelarea_dim T3            ON T1.PA = T3.PersonnelAreaCode -- 997
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.personnelsubarea_dim T4         ON T1.PSubarea = T4.PersonnelSubAreaCode -- 997
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.organisationunit_dim T5         ON T1.Org_Unit = T5.OrganisationUnit AND -- 997
                                                               T1.Organizational_Unit = T5.Description AND 
                                                               T1.Organizational_Key12 = T5.OrganisationUnitKey
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.contract_dim T6                 ON T1.WorkC = T6.ContractCode AND -- 997
                                                               T1.Work_Contract = T6.Description AND
                                                               T1.CT = T6.ContractTypeCode AND 
                                                               T1.Contract_Type = T6.ContractType
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.payband_dim T7                  ON T1.PS_Group = T7.PSGroupCode -- 997
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.costcenter_dim T8               ON T1.Cost_Ctr = T8.CostCenterCode --997
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.position_dim T9                 ON T1.PositionID = T9.PositionCode -- this may change -- 997
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_hr_hierarchy_dim T10   ON T2.EmployeeID = T10.EmployeeID -- 997
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.pins_location_dim T11           ON T1.Loc = T11.LocationCode -- 997
